verses.text: \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w ye|strong="G4891"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* be risen \w with|strong="G4891"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* those things which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w above|strong="G0507"\w*, \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w sitteth|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

Set your \w affection|strong="G5426"\w* on \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w above|strong="G0507"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* on \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye are \w dead|strong="G0599"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* is \w hid|strong="G2928"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w When|strong="G3752"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \add who is\add* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, shall \w appear|strong="G5319"\w*, \w then|strong="G5119"\w* \w shall|strong="G5319"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w appear|strong="G5319"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w Mortify|strong="G3499"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*; \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w*, inordinate \w affection|strong="G3806"\w*, \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w concupiscence|strong="G1939"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w covetousness|strong="G4124"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w idolatry|strong="G1495"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1223"\w* which \w thingsâ€™|strong="G3739"\w* \w sake|strong="G1223"\w* the \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w disobedience|strong="G0543"\w*:

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w walked|strong="G4043"\w* some \w time|strong="G4218"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* ye \w lived|strong="G2198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* put \w off|strong="G0659"\w* all \w these|strong="G3956"\w*; \w anger|strong="G3709"\w*, \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w*, \w malice|strong="G2549"\w*, \w blasphemy|strong="G0988"\w*, filthy \w communication|strong="G0148"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*.

\w Lie|strong="G5574"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, seeing that ye have put \w off|strong="G0554"\w* the \w old|strong="G3820"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w deeds|strong="G4234"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* have put \w on|strong="G1746"\w* the \w new|strong="G3501"\w* \add man\add*, which is \w renewed|strong="G0341"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w image|strong="G1504"\w* of him that \w created|strong="G2936"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w Where|strong="G3699"\w* there \w is|strong="G1762"\w* \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w* \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*, \w Barbarian|strong="G0915"\w*, \w Scythian|strong="G4658"\w*, \w bond|strong="G1401"\w* \add nor\add* \w free|strong="G1658"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add is\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

Put \w on|strong="G1746"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w elect|strong="G1588"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0025"\w*, \w bowels|strong="G4698"\w* of \w mercies|strong="G3628"\w*, \w kindness|strong="G5544"\w*, humbleness of \w mind|strong="G5012"\w*, \w meekness|strong="G4236"\w*, \w longsuffering|strong="G3115"\w*;

\w Forbearing|strong="G0430"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w forgiving|strong="G5483"\w* one \w another|strong="G1438"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* a \w quarrel|strong="G3437"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w*: \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w forgave|strong="G5483"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add do\add* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w above|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* these \w things|strong="G5125"\w* \add put on\add* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w bond|strong="G4886"\w* of \w perfectness|strong="G5047"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1018"\w* the \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w rule|strong="G1018"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* ye are \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be \w ye|strong="G1096"\w* \w thankful|strong="G2170"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1774"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w dwell|strong="G1774"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w richly|strong="G4146"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*; \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w admonishing|strong="G3560"\w* one \w another|strong="G1438"\w* in \w psalms|strong="G5568"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hymns|strong="G5215"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \w songs|strong="G5603"\w*, \w singing|strong="G0103"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5100"\w* \w soever|strong="G3956"\w* ye \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w deed|strong="G2041"\w*, \add do\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, giving \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Wives|strong="G1135"\w*, submit \w yourselves|strong="G5293"\w* unto your \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* it is \w fit|strong="G0433"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Husbands|strong="G0435"\w*, \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \add your\add* \w wives|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G4087"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w bitter|strong="G4087"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \add your\add* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* well \w pleasing|strong="G2101"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, \w provoke|strong="G2042"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \add to anger\add*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* they be \w discouraged|strong="G0120"\w*.

\w Servants|strong="G1401"\w*, \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \add your\add* \w masters|strong="G2962"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*; \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w eyeservice|strong="G3787"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w menpleasers|strong="G0441"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w singleness|strong="G0572"\w* of \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w fearing|strong="G5399"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5100"\w* \w soever|strong="G3956"\w* ye \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, \w do|strong="G2038"\w* \add it\add* \w heartily|strong="G5590"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* unto \w men|strong="G0444"\w*;

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* ye shall \w receive|strong="G0618"\w* the \w reward|strong="G0469"\w* of the \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he that doeth \w wrong|strong="G0091"\w* shall receive for the \w wrong|strong="G2865"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w done|strong="G0091"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* respect of \w persons|strong="G4382"\w*.
